summary: Various different non-seamless textures created from vanilla files, useful for making other textures fit closer with the rest of the game.
descriptionHtml:
Various different non-seamless textures created from vanilla files, useful for making other textures fit closer with the rest of the game.

I recommend using something like clone stamp and using multiple of a material for best results. using them as-is won't look good at all.

I'm going to add more to this as time goes on

Currently in the archive:
-Iron (1hsword)

-----

[b]I have a few requests to anybody using these resources:
[/b]
-Please add images to this page so others can get an idea of examples
-Comment for other templates of vanilla that you would want added
-Please link your uploaded files in the comments so I can add them to this description
author: SgtDoge
